humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the tumor as 2.2 x 1.5 x 1.3 cm. According to the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. The tumor size in this report falls within this range, making the pathologic T stage T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the tumor size is described as 2.2 x 1.5 x 1.3 cm. The T stage is determined by the greatest dimension of the tumor. In this case, the greatest dimension is 2.2 cm, which falls within the T2 category (tumor size > 2 cm and ≤ 5 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2.
